name: LEZA-Chat App (Mondelez International AI Chatbot)
description: LEZA is an AI-powered chatbot developed for Mondelez International, designed to provide customer support and engagement through natural language processing. It offers real-time responses, product recommendations, and customer service automation.
role: AI Chatbot Fullstack and cloud Developer

name: Verizon BYOD Journey
description: The Verizon BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) project is a next-generation migration of the BYOD journey for Verizon. It focuses on implementing complex logic, improving user experience, and integrating microfrontend architecture for seamless device onboarding.

name: Verizon Innovative Learning HQ
description: The Verizon Innovative Learning HQ (VILS) program is an educational platform designed to provide free resources and tools for students and educators, enhancing STEM learning experiences through an intuitive and interactive digital platform.

name: Livia USA
description: Livia is a web-based react website where pharmacies and patient professionals can log in and get consultation on various types of issues related to health, code focus of the application is providing COVID 19 Testing and Doses.

name: Adidas
description: Adidas designs for and with athletes of all kinds. Creators, who love to change the game. Challenge conventions. Break the rules and define new ones. Then break them again. We supply teams and individuals with athletic clothing pre-match.

name: Circular Drive (CIDR)
description: CircularDrive was created to help shuttle providers and transportation companies streamline their operations—providing ease and convenience to riders, and boosting the company’s reputation and income generation in the process.

name: ACT Nurses Portal
description: ACT Home Health Services, Inc. is a home care agency that services residents throughout the 5 major counties Pennsylvania (Philadelphia, Montgomery, Chester, Bucks and Delaware County). Through our quality care, we help our clients through the medical, physical and emotional strain that comes when home health care is needed.

name: Ajivar-The Resiliency App
description: Ajivar uses artificial intelligence (AI) to create a journey of self-discovery for everyone. By offering fun and uplifting ways to engage in mindfulness training such as positive affirmations (called 'Posimations'), journaling, and out-of-zone (Ooz) challenges, Ajivar pushes you out of your usual comfort zone to develop higher self-esteem and, ultimately, self-acceptance.

name: Overture Health Care
description: Overture Health Care has developed the most innovative healthy habit change and chronic disease management platform in the industry today. Using behavior change-centered clinical coaching, cutting-edge smartphone technology, and data analytics, the Overture Health Care health management platform is designed to significantly improve the health of your employee population and reduce health care costs.

name: Qvik Task
description: QvikTask is a web-based react website where businesses and independent professionals connect and collaborate remotely.

name: Procure Network Core
description: Procure Network helps non-profit organizations save money to serve more people. Our target market is focused on organizations such as schools, colleges and universities, hospitals, religious organizations, and service organizations around the world – people who serve other people to improve our world.

name: ReachLive
description: Reach Live is a video streaming platform where content creators can build, curate, and manage their own pay-per-view content service.
